resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-dfs-index",
    settings={
        "number_of_shards": 2,
        "number_of_replicas": 1
    },
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "my-keyword": {
                "type": "keyword"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.bulk(
    index="my-dfs-index",
    refresh=True,
    operations=[
        {
            "index": {
                "_id": "1"
            }
        },
        {
            "my-keyword": "a"
        },
        {
            "index": {
                "_id": "2"
            }
        },
        {
            "my-keyword": "b"
        }
    ],
)
print(resp1)
